name: Elspeth
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
attacked: You are without honor. Your defeat will be my pleasure.
defeated: This only happened because I was Mana hosed!
introduction: Walk in the light and you may survive.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: Perhaps we can come to some arrangement.

name: Dwarves
startIntroPart1: 'When there's no more room in Hell, the dead will walk the earth.' - George A. Romero
startIntroPart2: 'Darkness falls across the land, the midnight hour is close at hand, creatures crawl in search of blood to terrorize y'all's neighborhood' - Vincent Price
uniques: +30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [-60]
[non-air] units gain the [Breach the Walls] promotion
[Melee] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion

name: Dwarves
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
